languages.text: "Готовы — увидимся на верхней палубе "Бессердечного", Вольный Торговец".
languages.translation_comment:
Соломон
после этого куя переходим в окно выбора пати

Соломон
после этого куя переходим в окно выбора пати

languages.text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Готовы — увидимся на верхней палубе "Бессердечного", Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."
"Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."
"Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."
"Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."
"Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."
"Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: «Listos y a la espera. L{mf|e|a} veré en la cubierta superior de la Desalmada, Comerciante».
languages.original_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Listos y a la espera. L{mf|e|a} veré en la cubierta superior de la Desalmada, Comerciante».

languages.text: “已经整装待命。我们在无心号的上层甲板汇合吧，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “已经整装待命。我们在无心号的上层甲板汇合吧，行商浪人。”

languages.text: « Parés à intervenir. Rendez-vous sur le pont supérieur du Sans-Cœur, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Parés à intervenir. Rendez-vous sur le pont supérieur du Sans-Cœur, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: 「準備完了。待機中。ローグトレーダー、ハートレスの上層デッキでお会いしましょう」
languages.original_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「準備完了。待機中。ローグトレーダー、ハートレスの上層デッキでお会いしましょう」

languages.text: "Hazırız, bekliyoruz. Taşkalp'in üst güvertesinde görüşmek dileğiyle Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Hazırız, bekliyoruz. Taşkalp'in üst güvertesinde görüşmek dileğiyle Lord Kaptan."

languages.text: "Bereit und auf Standby. Wir sehen uns auf dem Oberdeck der Heartless, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Ready and waiting. I will see you on the upper deck of the Heartless, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Bereit und auf Standby. Wir sehen uns auf dem Oberdeck der Heartless, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
